name: Artisan 5 Page
summary: An ARTPAGE file is a page of a scrapbook, photo book, or calendar created by version 5 of FOREVER Artisan scrapbook designing software. It is a Zip archive that contains several files, including .JPG , .TXT , and .XML files that store information about the page, including design elements (e.g., images, text, and shapes) and metadata (e.g., page dimensions). FOREVER replaced ARTPAGE files with A6PAGE files when it released version 6 of its Artisan software.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
